Major Arcana.name: The Fool
Major Arcana.upright: Beginnings, innocence, spontaneity, a free spirit
Major Arcana.reversed: Holding back, recklessness, risk-taking

Major Arcana.name: The Magician
Major Arcana.upright: Manifestation, resourcefulness, power, inspired action
Major Arcana.reversed: Manipulation, poor planning, untapped potential

Major Arcana.name: The High Priestess
Major Arcana.upright: Intuition, sacred knowledge, divine feminine, the subconscious mind
Major Arcana.reversed: Secrets, disconnected from intuition, withdrawal, silence

Major Arcana.name: The Empress
Major Arcana.upright: Femininity, beauty, nature, nurturing, abundance
Major Arcana.reversed: Creative block, dependence on others

Major Arcana.name: The Emperor
Major Arcana.upright: Authority, establishment, structure, a father figure
Major Arcana.reversed: Domination, excessive control, lack of discipline, inflexibility

Major Arcana.name: The Hierophant
Major Arcana.upright: Spiritual wisdom, religious beliefs, conformity, tradition, institutions
Major Arcana.reversed: Personal beliefs, freedom, challenging the status quo

Major Arcana.name: The Lovers
Major Arcana.upright: Love, harmony, partnerships, values alignment, choices
Major Arcana.reversed: Self-love, disharmony, imbalance, misalignment of values

Major Arcana.name: The Chariot
Major Arcana.upright: Control, willpower, success, action, determination
Major Arcana.reversed: Self-discipline, opposition, lack of direction

Major Arcana.name: Strength
Major Arcana.upright: Strength, courage, persuasion, influence, compassion
Major Arcana.reversed: Inner strength, self-doubt, low energy, raw emotion

Major Arcana.name: The Hermit
Major Arcana.upright: Soul-searching, introspection, being alone, inner guidance
Major Arcana.reversed: Isolation, loneliness, withdrawal

Major Arcana.name: Wheel of Fortune
Major Arcana.upright: Good luck, karma, life cycles, destiny, a turning point
Major Arcana.reversed: Bad luck, resistance to change, breaking cycles

Major Arcana.name: Justice
Major Arcana.upright: Justice, fairness, truth, cause and effect, law
Major Arcana.reversed: Unfairness, lack of accountability, dishonesty

Major Arcana.name: The Hanged Man
Major Arcana.upright: Pause, surrender, letting go, new perspectives
Major Arcana.reversed: Delays, resistance, stalling, indecision

Major Arcana.name: Death
Major Arcana.upright: Endings, change, transformation, transition
Major Arcana.reversed: Resistance to change, personal transformation, inner purging

Major Arcana.name: Temperance
Major Arcana.upright: Balance, moderation, patience, purpose
Major Arcana.reversed: Imbalance, excess, self-healing, re-alignment

Major Arcana.name: The Devil
Major Arcana.upright: Shadow self, attachment, addiction, restriction, sexuality
Major Arcana.reversed: Releasing limiting beliefs, exploring dark thoughts, detachment

Major Arcana.name: The Tower
Major Arcana.upright: Sudden change, upheaval, chaos, revelation, awakening
Major Arcana.reversed: Personal transformation, fear of change, averting disaster

Major Arcana.name: The Star
Major Arcana.upright: Hope, faith, purpose, renewal, spirituality
Major Arcana.reversed: Lack of faith, despair, self-trust, disconnection

Major Arcana.name: The Moon
Major Arcana.upright: Illusion, fear, anxiety, subconscious, intuition
Major Arcana.reversed: Release of fear, repressed emotion, inner confusion

Major Arcana.name: The Sun
Major Arcana.upright: Positivity, fun, warmth, success, vitality
Major Arcana.reversed: Inner child, feeling down, overly optimistic

Major Arcana.name: Judgement
Major Arcana.upright: Judgement, rebirth, inner calling, absolution
Major Arcana.reversed: Self-doubt, inner critic, ignoring the call

Major Arcana.name: The World
Major Arcana.upright: Completion, integration, accomplishment, travel
Major Arcana.reversed: Seeking closure, short-cuts, delays
